1497.question: How is performance measured?

7-Table1-1.png: Performance is measured by the area under the curve (AUC) for the models used on the Gumtree dataset, with their 95% confidence intervals.
7-Figure3-1.png: Performance is measured by the area under the curve (AUC) of the receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curve.

1497.answer: they use ROC curves and cross-validation
